examples.example: 我的爸爸经常出差，但他总会给我们带有趣的礼物回来。

translate.english: My father often goes on business trips, but he always brings interesting gifts back for us.

examples.example: 我的同事这次出差去了远方，他说一定会完成工作任务满载而归。

translate.english: My colleague went on a business trip to a distant place this time, and he said that he would definitely complete the work task and return with a full load.

examples.example: 我的同事下周要出差去外地参加一个重要会议。

translate.english: My colleague will go on a business trip to another place to attend an important meeting next week.
